name: Feast in One Go
simple_desc: Whenever a teammate uses Technique, March 7th gains Charge upon entering the next battle. Using Technique regenerates Energy upon entering the next battle.
desc:
If March 7th is on the team, she gains 1 point of Charge at the start of the next battle whenever a teammate uses Technique, up to a max of #1[i] point(s).
After using Technique, March 7th regenerates #2[i] Energy when the next battle starts.
